name: Sobreviva
description: Awaken the COMPETITOR inside you! Destroy enemies with your strategy and skills on an island that floats in the sky.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 Processor: intel Celeron Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nenhuma Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: nenhuma
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 Processor: intel core i5, AMD Fx6300 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia Geforce GTX600 series Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: nenhuma
